r.d: This is the MySQL MDB2 driver.
r.n:
- fixed bug #15650: mysqli function used in setCharset() - fixed bug #16003: incorrect check for error after mysql_store_result - fixed bug #16147: first prepared statement is emulated when using factory with mysql - fixed bug #16669: hostspec is ignored when protocol is unix - fixed bug #17037: 'on update' not mentioned in tableInfo() - fixed bug #17065: There is no NEW row in on DELETE trigger (fix error in FK constraint triggers) - fixed bug #17650: lastInsertId can not handle bigint, forces cast to integer [alexpw] - return ON UPDATE|DELETE action in getTableConstraintDefinition()
note: - the multi_query test failes because this is not supported by ext/mysql
open todo items: - use a trigger to emulate setting default now()
